titleInfo.title: Disc Jockey Convention hosted in Nashville, Tennessee at the Hermitage Hotel, 1956

mods.identifier: RG 3 8191 Disc Jockey convention Hermitage Hotel 1956 003

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: A view of the Disc Jockey Convention hosted in Nashville, Tennessee at the Hermitage Hotel in 1956. Mayor Ben West and Minnie Pearl (seen on stage) also participated in the event. The group was welcomed by the Grand Ole Opry, the country-music variety show that began on radio station WSM in Nashville circa 1925. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.

titleInfo.title: Record Group 3 Metro Davidson County Photographer
